## Session.removeItem() method

Removes the item with the specified key from the specified storage.

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeItem(key: string | UserInfoKeys, storage: StorageType): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string \| UserInfoKeys | The key of the item to remove. |
|  storage | [StorageType](./foundation-comms.storagetype.md) | The storage type to use. |

**Returns:**

void
